name: Law of Blood - A Vampire Story
name_original: Law of Blood - A Vampire Story
description: You learned about the Law of Blood when you were first turned into a vampire.  In fact, it's the reason you exist.  But now, independent of your sire and at the mercy of another vampire, you must interpret the Law on your own.  This game was created as part of Vampire: the Masquerade Game Jam.  Events portrayed in this game are not canon within the World of Darkness universe.
